short_description: An exquisitely restored baroque chateau at the foot of Mont Ventoux, set amidst 5 hectares of private park and forest in Provence. Built in 1725, the chateau offers 7 air-conditioned bedrooms sleeping 12-14 guests, with indoor and outdoor celebration spaces for up to 200 guests.
